title: New Nintendo Switch $100 More? - Kinda Funny Games Daily 03.23.21
description:
Gary and Greg talk about the new Switch rumors, Xbox Live dying, and more!

00:00:00 - Start
00:02:00 - Housekeeping
SnyderCut In Review is done and there’s a new KF Podcast on youtube.com/kindafunny
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Mick @DaNanoBiologist Abrahamson, Black Jack, & Trent Berrie, & Black Jack
The Roper Report   -
00:09:20 - More Switch Pro Rumors, Takashi Mochizuki and Ian King @ Bloomberg
00:19:45 - Microsoft in Talks to Buy Discord, Dina Bass and Katie Roof @ Bloomberg
00:31:30 - Xbox Live is Dead, Long Live Xbox Network, Tom Warren at the Verge
00:34:50 -DrinkBox Reveal at Friday’s ID@Xbox Showcase, Eddie @ GameSpot
00:37:30 -  Ad
00:41:15 - Monster Hunter Rise Review Round-Up
00:45:49 - Niantic and Nintendo working on a Pikmin App,  Niantic
00:49:50 - Studio Openings and Acquisitions!
00:53:00 - Out today
01:01:00 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:Blessing and Janet
